source.interface:
Hotspot internal management interface for the thread system. Returns the current number of VM internal threads. the current number of VM internal threads. Returns a Map of the name of all VM internal threads to the thread CPU time in nanoseconds. The returned value is of nanoseconds precision but not necessarily nanoseconds accuracy.

a Map object of the name of all VM internal threads to the thread CPU time in nanoseconds. java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException if the Java virtual machine does not support CPU time measurement. java.lang.management.ThreadMBean#isThreadCpuTimeSupported Returns a list of internal counters maintained in the Java virtual machine for the thread system. a list of internal counters maintained in the VM for the thread system.
